summary: WorkflowNotFoundError is currently exported from an internal module (@temporalio/internal-workflow-common) while other common errors like WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError are exported from @temporalio/client. The request is to re-export WorkflowNotFoundError from @temporalio/client for API consistency.
userImpact: Users must import WorkflowNotFoundError from an internal module instead of the public client module, creating an inconsistent and confusing API.
rootCause: WorkflowNotFoundError was not included in the public @temporalio/client exports alongside other common errors.
proposedFix: Re-export WorkflowNotFoundError from @temporalio/client to make it available alongside other error exports.
resolutionDetails: The maintainer acknowledged the issue and agreed to re-export the error from the client module.
keyQuote: I think it would be nice to have one place that re-exports all possible errors, so there is no need to import from "internal-workflow-common" at all.
